entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as someone Ron's sister has ditched, implying he was in a relationship with her.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as Dean's partner, and his sister is still considered part of the group.

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: Katie Bell is mentioned as someone who has returned to the common room after being absent, and is greeted by Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as greeting Katie Bell upon her return.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as barely noticing the group of seventh-years in the common room, and only registers their presence when Hermione greets Katie Bell.

relationships.description: Dean is mentioned as Ron's partner, implying a romantic relationship between them.
Hermione greets Katie Bell upon her return, indicating a friendly relationship between the two.
